June 25, 2020 Customizing Aloha Online Ordering – New Live Training <#CustomizingAlohaOnlineOrdering> Self-Paced Technical Courses – NCRU <#SelfPacedTechnicalCourses> Fulfillment Orders Reminder for Independence Day – July 3, 2020 <#FulfillmentOrdersReminder> NCR Payment Solutions Lab Setup <#NCRPaymentSolutionsLabSetup> Updates to Subscription Program <#SubscriptionProgramUpdates> Customizing Aloha Online Ordering Here’s your opportunity to learn all the inside tips on how to customize NCR Aloha Online Ordering in our newest technical training courses in July. The NCR training calendar <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/rq/ek/va/virtual technical training.pdf]]> for the third quarter includes information on specific dates/times for each offering, course details, and registration information. Technicians must register in advance via NCRU <[[https://ncr.csod.com/client/ncr/default2.aspx]]> to attend these sessions and receive credit for participation. For additional questions concerning the calendar or NCRU, <[[https://ncr.csod.com/client/ncr/default2.aspx]]> email hospitailitytraining@ncr.com <[[mailto:hospitailitytraining@ncr.com]]>
${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Self-Paced Technical Courses – NCRU Too busy to attend a live virtual class? We’ve got you covered! Most virtual coursework is also available as self-paced content that’s accessible 24/7 on NCRU <[[https://ncr.csod.com/client/ncr/default2.aspx]]>. To locate a curriculum, simply enter the curriculum number into the search bar in NCRU. <[[https://ncr.csod.com/client/ncr/default2.aspx]]> Some of our most popular self-paced courses include:
- Aloha Takeout Self-Paced – CURR82319 - Aloha Online Ordering Self-Paced – CURR82393 - Aloha Kitchen Self-Paced – CURR82314
Still need help? Email us at: hospitailitytraining@ncr.com <[[mailto:hospitailitytraining@ncr.com]]> Fulfillment Orders Reminder for Independence Day – July 3, 2020 Friday, July 3, 2020 is Independence Day, a U.S. national holiday observed by NCR and our logistics provider. It is not considered a business day, so all orders will be fulfilled as listed below. The cut off time for all orders is 6:00 p.m. ET.
- Next Calendar Day (NCD) service level orders are not affected by the holiday. These orders will be shipped the same day as ordered and delivered the following day. - Next Business Day (NBD) service level orders will be fulfilled on the next business day following the holiday. - Next Flight Out (NFO) service level orders will be available every day, including Friday, July 3rd and Saturday, July 4th. NCR Payment Solutions Lab Setup To order Equinox Luxe lab equipment, allow a 3 - 4 week lead time to receive the equipment. Please use the Aloha with NCR Payment Solutions Playbook <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/Link/Content/DC8MoPZjahn0uillmSQzdLcg]]> for information on processes to set up your equipment.
Your Channel Account Managers are available to assist if you have any questions. Cloud Sales Representatives are also available to help you input NCR Payment Solutions orders into Salesforce. Leveraging them as a resource will prevent issues in implementation due to hardware delays. Updates to Subscription Program Equinox Tethered Device Clarification
All tethered devices sold through the Aloha Essentials program will come with the stand cable, but does not include the stand. Any stands should be sold upfront through your office, similar to mounting brackets or printer cabling.
New Quoting Functionality – Clone and Move
You will now see a “Clone and Move” button on the Quote page in the Aloha Essentials Salesforce portal. This should help multi-site customers with similar configurations across sites, or even single-site customers asking for several different configurations quoted out. Visit this link <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/rn/ek/va/New Quoting Functionality Article.pdf]]> for detailed instructions.
Updated NCR Tablet Essentials has updated the Tablet to PID 7779-3023-8801 – the main change is a new processor. These units will no longer ship with a USB charging cable, only the tablet charging stand (PID 7779-K101). Available Documents on Aloha Essentials Salesforce Portal You can always access commonly requested documents – including the latest addendum tools - through the Salesforce portal. Go to the Documents tab, choose the “POS Partner Docs” from the drop-down and press Go. That will display the documents you can view/save/print as needed. Please contact alohaessentials@ncr.com <[[mailto:alohaessentials@ncr.com]]> with any questions.
